title: amaroKontrol
summary: Remote control for Amarok music player.
description: Remote control for Amarok music player. You'll need to install script into Amarok before using (instructions in app's menu -> Help). Script is also available on: http://kde-apps.org/content/show.php?content=161189(Based on, and backward compatibile with Amarok2 Remote script - You can safely remove old script)Application features:- remote controls (play/pause, skip to next/previous track, volume control)- current playlist, collection browser- ability to add/remove tracks to/from current playlist- lyrics (only for 10" tablets)- 3 types of notification- download songs from PC to device- optimized for smartphones, 7" and 10" tabletsGet source code here:https://github.com/MatejVancik/amaroKontrolFor android <4.0, there's similar application called Amarok2 Remote, available on: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.h0lger.amarok2remote
descriptionHTML:
Remote control for Amarok music player. You'll need to install script into Amarok before using (instructions in app's menu -> Help). Script is also available on: http://kde-apps.org/content/show.php?content=161189
(Based on, and backward compatibile with Amarok2 Remote script - You can safely remove old script)

Application features:
- remote controls (play/pause, skip to next/previous track, volume control)
- current playlist, collection browser
- ability to add/remove tracks to/from current playlist
- lyrics (only for 10" tablets)
- 3 types of notification
- download songs from PC to device
- optimized for smartphones, 7" and 10" tablets

Get source code here:
https://github.com/MatejVancik/amaroKontrol


For android <4.0, there's similar application called Amarok2 Remote, available on:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.h0lger.amarok2remote
comments: Does not work.. Will give 5 stars if you guys could actually make a troubleshooting guide, port 8484 is not working & I don't see anywhere to change ports! (Running Ubuntu)
Awesome app. Everything works flawlessly, can't ask for more but a better UI would make this app even more awesome than it already is. Thanks.
Excellent app. Remember to find the IP of the machine running Amarok, and set it in the app. Also remember to open port 8484 in any firewall on that machine.
This app is great. I am impressed with how well it works and how quickly it responds.  Thank you mv^2 studio. You are incredible
The only thing that I'd add is the ability to play the Amarok library through the Android speaker.
Works great Works excellent, although a little light on features. It would be great to be able to see and edit paylists in the app.
recentChanges: - REQUIRES UPDATE OF AMAROK SCRIPT ON YOUR PC!
